question: The cover of the August 2021 issue of Vogue shows a famous landmark in the background behind some trees. How tall is this monument in yards, rounded to the nearest yard? Give the number only.

1. A First Lady for All of Us: On the Road with Dr. Jill Biden | Vogue
   URL: https://www.vogue.com/article/first-lady-dr-jill-biden-profile
   Site: vogue.com

2. In Jill Biden's Vogue cover, there's optimism and rebuke
   URL: https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2021/06/29/jill-bidens-vogue-cover-theres-optimism-rebuke/
   Site: washingtonpost.com
   Date: Jun 29, 2021
   Summary: She stands on a White House balcony with the Washington Monument rising in the distance. The image is stately. Not quite exuberant, but ...

3. Images of the Week: Jill Biden Covers Vogue's August Issue
   URL: https://www.vogue.com/slideshow/images-of-the-week-jill-biden-covers-vogues-august-issue
   Site: vogue.com
   Date: Jul 3, 2021
   Summary: For the cover, shot by Annie Leibovitz, she wore an Oscar de la Renta floral dress and earrings by Tiffany & Co.

trajectory.actor_reasoning:
The August 2021 Vogue cover features Jill Biden on a White House balcony with the Washington Monument in the background; the Washington Monument’s commonly cited height of about 555 feet converts to approximately 185 yards, which rounds to 185.

FINAL ANSWER: 185
